name: GNS3
summary: Build, design and test a network without needing the hardware.
description: What is GNS3? Build, design and test your network in a risk-free virtual environment, and access the largest networking community to help. Whether you are studying for your first networking exam or building out a state-wide telecommunications network, GNS3 offers an easy way to design and build networks of any size without the need for hardware.
